definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)

sentences.english: The implications for desertification and global warming are immense.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠化和全球變暖之間有着千絲萬縷的聯繫。

sentences.english: Guangzhou people and the inextricable link across the province.
sentences.chinese: 廣州人與全省各地有着千絲萬縷的聯繫。

sentences.english: The grain on chair, be like soft Bei Wen, countless ties interweaves have send.
sentences.chinese: 椅上紋理，如柔軟貝紋，千絲萬縷交織有致。

sentences.english: From the angle of regional culture, the paper mainly discusses the relationship between Wu culture and style of LU Ji's works.
sentences.chinese: 陸機作品風格與吳地文化之間存在千絲萬縷的聯繫。

sentences.english: But the Confucian temple and the salty wild duck have the very complicated relation.
sentences.chinese: 而夫子廟與鹽水鴨則有着千絲萬縷的聯繫。

sentences.english: This season of the year is supposed to be about giving.
sentences.chinese: 今年這個季節好像總是與給予有千絲萬縷的聯繫。

sentences.english: Inflammation is inextricably woven into the natural history of atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 炎症是動脈粥樣硬化的自然歷史有着千絲萬縷織成。

definition: different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent
to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
